name: Jong-Seok Lee
content: MCML Group - Yonsei UniversityResearch AreasExplainable AIExplainable AI aims to improve the transparency of AI decisions through interpretable methodsResponsible AIFocusing on safe image generation and machine unlearning.Efficient AIFocusing on learned image compression and knowledge distillation.Brain-Computer InterfacesBCI is a powerful way to understand users' perception directly by monitoring brain activitiesDynamic Vision SensorsDynamic Vision Sensors detect rapid visual changes through event-based imagingMultimodal Deep LearningOften, heterogeneous sensors are simultaneously involved, which produce multimodal dataNews←→Sep. 2025Prof. Lee serves as Area Chair of ICLR 2026Jul. 2025Prof. Lee serves as Senior PC of AAAI 2026Jul. 2025Paper accepted in MMSP 2025Jun. 2025Paper accepted in SMC 2025May 2025Paper accepted in ICIP 2025Apr. 2025Paper accepted in Machine Vision and ApplicationsJan. 2025Paper accepted in ICLR 2025Jan. 2025Paper accepted in Pattern Recognition LettersNov. 2024Prof. Lee got elected as a member of the Image, Video, and Multidimensional Signal Processing Technical Committee (IVMSP TC) of the IEEE Signal Processing SocietyNov. 2024Prof. Lee got elected as a member of the Multimedia Signal Processing Technical Committee (MMSP TC) of the IEEE Signal Processing Society
